definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Each flower also once had a lovely perfume like smell.
sentences.chinese: 每一種花卉也曾經擁有一種可愛的芬香氣味。

sentences.english: Katherine could smell the high sweet scent of marijuana.
sentences.chinese: 凱瑟琳可以聞到大麻濃厚的甜蜜芬香。

sentences.english: The pine cones smell so good. Wish I could save it.
sentences.chinese: 松果荗盛且芬香，惜不能記存。

sentences.english: Autumn fruit with golden light, and then wake up drunk fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 秋的果實上粘着金色的光芒，與那醉醒的芬香。

sentences.english: Scented Fuzhou Cereals, Oils &Foodstuffs Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 福州芬香糧油食品有限公司。

sentences.english: Taking time to stop and watch a beautiful sunset, or to enjoy the smell of fresh-mown grass.
sentences.chinese: 停下來看看美麗的日落時分，聞一聞路邊芬香的花朵。

sentences.english: Take every blossom seriously , and you'll have a fragrant season .
sentences.chinese: 認真開每一朵花，那就是芬香的季節。

sentences.english: Saponified Olive Oil, Water, Honey, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 皂化橄欖油，水，蜂蜜，鹽，芬香。

sentences.english: When spring comes the grass in my lawn smells fresh and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 春天一到，我的草坪青草氣味清新芬香。

sentences.english: Assyrian warriors curled their long beards with scented oils.
sentences.chinese: 亞述族的武士曾用芬香的油料來捲曲他們的長鬍子。

sentences.english: For me, the lotus and blue cedar dominate, but they work well together.
sentences.chinese: 她的芬香以蓮花和藍色雪松爲主，幾種香味完美融合。

sentences.english: The air that sweeps the South Sea Islands is fragrant with flowers and spice.
sentences.chinese: 掃除南太平洋諸島的空氣對花和藥料感到芬香。

sentences.english: This formula goes on like butter and smells deliciously of pure cocoa powder.
sentences.chinese: 這個公式，像黃油和純可可粉的氣味芬香。

definition: to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
(usually of sth intangible) to seep into/to permeate
